effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a flurry of 7 Demonfire bolts at 100% effectiveness. Casting Summon Infernal always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! increases your Mastery by 2.0% and your spells gain maximum benefit from Mastery: Chaotic Energies for 10 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 822 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 822 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 9,300 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 2.8 million Fire damage to your primary target and 227,743 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 30 sec. (1 Min Cooldown)

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
